short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple app that 'skips' YouTubeTM ads, because we're into that kinda thing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube(TM) Blocker is an extension that helps you browse YouTube(TM) with less distractions and more peace. It achieves this by hiding unwanted thumbnail images, comments, chats, advertisements, and "skips" advertisements; providing for a better browsing experience with zero clickbait shenanigans. This extension can be useful for avoiding inappropriate imagery or spoilers.

Users of this extension will find YouTube(TM) Blocker to be useful for a variety of purposes and environmental settings. Whether you use this extension at work, at school or at home, you will be able to stay focused and on task with this useful extension. You won't want to go back to the way things were before you stumbled upon this useful and very powerful tool. You will definitely see an increase in your productivity from using this extension.

User defined options in the YouTube(TM) Blocker settings menu include:
1) Hiding YouTube(TM) Thumbnails
2) Hiding YouTube(TM) Comments
3) Hiding YouTube(TM) Chats
4) Hiding YouTube(TM) Advertisements
5) "Skipping" all YouTube(TM) Advertisements Automatically
*Note: You do have the ability to toggle the functionality of "skipping" all the advertisements on or off so that you can watch them and continue to support YouTube(TM). 

System Requirements:
1) A desktop or laptop (Mobile devices are not supported at this time)
2) Google Chrome
*Note: Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari etc.. may or may not work properly. Please submit feedback to me in order to get any issues with these browsers fixed.

(20-04-2024) v2.3 Update Notes***
*Fixed bug where sometimes the payment options wouldn't load.
*Added trial feature.
*Added dark mode feature.
*Added account management feature.
*Optimized app code to have a faster and smoother user experience.

Disclaimers: 
This app does contain in app purchases but does not attempt to store your personal information. All of the payment processing is handled by ExtensionPay via Stripe.com and their secured payment processing centers. All privacy policies and rights for the payment processing feature found within this app can be found at the following link: https://stripe.com/privacy

No claim is made to the exclusive right to use YouTube(TM) apart from the mark as shown. All trademarks, logos and brand names are the property of their respective owners. All company, product and service names used in this app are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, trademarks, and brands does not imply endorsement.
